choices.answer: It was a tiring & hot day for them
Three demons had tried to attack them that day
The children became less naughty

choices.answer: Krishna's maya made them forget it
They were not real but Krishna's manifestation
Krishna asked them to keep it a secret
The children were too tired and went to sleep early

questions.question: What is the time-equation between our time & Brahma's time ?

he was astonished to see the same kids & calves in the forest

was angry at Brahma, and wanted to teach him a lesson
summoned Brahma to appear before him as a punishment
gave Brahma the 4-handed vision of himself in every kid & calf
told Brahma not to play any more tricks

questions.question: After Brahma was confused seeing the same kids & calves on earth, Krishna __________

choices.answer: Lord Vishnu
Lord Brahma
Lord Indra
Lord Siva
